_header: I pray Thee lady the Mother of Christ
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary; prayers, to saints
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary and all saints — one stanza rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
I pray þe lady þe moder of cristPraieth ȝoure sone
                    me for to spare…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…Graunt me of ȝoure merites a participacion And praieth
                    oure lorde for me saluacyon
BodRawB408.Attributed Title: Precor sanctam mariam omnes sanctos et cetera (f. 6)
